name: socialhome
description: Socialhome is a self-hosted, federated social media platform supporting streams, profiles, and ActivityPub federation. It allows rich content posting and follows in a grid-like UI.

features.title: Federated Social
features.description: Connects with ActivityPub and Diaspora networks

features.title: Content Streams
features.description: Displays posts in customizable timeline streams

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Supports text, images, videos, and embedded media in posts

features.title: Profile Pages
features.description: Creates personal profile pages with bio and content grid

features.title: Following System
features.description: Follows users across federated social networks

features.title: Content Visibility
features.description: Controls post visibility as public, followers-only, or private

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organizes and discovers content with hashtags

features.title: Reactions
features.description: Likes, shares, and comments on posts from federated users
